articles.description: Manchester City's tame Champions League surrender to Real Madrid marks the end of an era, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Champions League: 'Manchester City's surrender in the Bernabeu is the end of an era'

articles.description: Real Madrid forward Kylian Mbappe's goal against Manchester City in the first leg may have come from a scrappy finish but there was nothing fortunate about his hat-trick in the return leg at Santiago Bernabeu on Wednesday.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: Real Madrid striker wants to 'write history' after hat-trick past Manchester City

articles.description: Liverpool boss Arne Slot says it was two points dropped in the Premier League title race after a draw at Aston Villa.
articles.title: Premier League: Point gained or two dropped? How title race looks after Liverpool draw

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says "nothing is eternal" after his side are knocked out of the Champions League by Real Madrid.
articles.title: Real Madrid 3-1 Man City (agg 6-3): Pep Guardiola says 'nothing is eternal' after exit

articles.description: Emma Raducanu was targeted by a man who "exhibited fixated behaviour" during her second-round loss to Karolina Muchova in Dubai, the WTA says.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: British player targeted by man who 'exhibited fixated behaviour'

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says Ferrari have "absolutely every ingredient to win" as the team launch the car he hopes will take him to an eighth world title.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton: 'I'm still acclimatising but it feels like a car I'm getting on well with'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Aston Villa vs Liverpool in the Premier League
articles.title: Aston Villa vs Liverpool LIVE: Premier League score, stats & updates

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from PSV vs Juventus in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: PSV Eindhoven 3-1 Juventus (Agg 4-3): Ryan Flamingo scores in extra time as PSV overturn deficit

articles.description: Paris St-Germain move into the last 16 of the Champions League with a thumping 10-0 aggregate victory over Brest.
articles.title: PSG 7-0 Brest: French champions stroll into last 16 with 10-0 aggregate win

articles.description: Bundesliga side Borussia Dortmund clinch their spot in the Champions League last 16 despite a goalless draw against Sporting in the second leg of their knockout play-off tie.
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund 0-0 Sporting: German side seal last-16 spot after second-leg draw
